function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Late adoption of NPHIs leading to ICU saturation","Impact":"Increased strain on healthcare systems, higher mortality rates","Mitigation":"Early adoption of NPHIs, real-time monitoring of pandemic patterns","Technologies":"Real-time data analytics, predictive modeling","People":"Communities, healthcare providers, authorities","Owner":"Health departments, government authorities"},{"Description":"Difficulty in measuring unique impact of specific NPHIs","Impact":"Challenges in determining the most effective intervention","Mitigation":"Improved data collection and analysis methods, standardized evaluation metrics","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, machine learning algorithms","People":"Researchers, public health agencies","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Economic impact of early NPHIs such as lockdown","Impact":"Destructive economic consequences","Mitigation":"Strategic planning for economic support, targeted relief measures","Technologies":"Economic simulation models, financial forecasting tools","People":"Businesses, workers, policymakers","Owner":"Government, economic planning authorities"}]}
